text: Roxas City is a city in the Philippines. It is the capital of Capiz province. In 2015, the city had 167,003 people. It is the second most important city in the island of Panay. The most important is Iloilo City. It is named after a former president of the Philippines and is known for its seafood and a statue of Jesus. File:Sacred Heart of Jesus giant statue.JPG|The statue of Jesus. File:Finger nail of the statue.jpg|A finger nail of the Jesus statue. title: Roxas, Capiz
